Johannes Brahms

Impromptu in E-flat major, Anh. IV/2 (Franz Schubert)

?

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of Franz Schubert’s impromptu in E-flat major (D 899/2). The arrangement is possibly spurious.

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
